function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through physical exercise","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in the community","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and social distancing measures in exercise facilities","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air ventilation systems, and sanitation equipment","People":"Exercise facility users, fitness trainers, and community members","Owner":"Health authorities, fitness facility management, and local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate compliance with preventive guidelines during physical activity","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion due to non-compliance with health regulations","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of guidelines, education on the importance of compliance, and regular monitoring of adherence","Technologies":"Communication systems, public health apps, and wearable health monitoring devices","People":"Exercise facility users, fitness trainers, and community members","Owner":"Health authorities, fitness facility management, and local government"},{"Description":"Stress and anxiety leading to non-compliance with preventive measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to people not following preventive protocols","Mitigation":"Promote mental health awareness, provide support services, and encourage stress-reducing activities","Technologies":"Mental health apps, virtual counseling platforms, and stress management tools","People":"General public, exercise facility users, and community members","Owner":"Health authorities, mental health organizations, and local government"}]}
